All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountantGroup
the accountant group, it has permissions to read about the patients and their treatments
AdminGroup
the administration group, it has every permission of the application
AlertCreator
Util class to create JavaFX alerts
AllCaregiversController
The AllCaregiversController contains the entire logic of the Caregiver view.
AllPatientController
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
AllTreatmentController
 
AllUserController
Logical Layer of the AllUserView Contains Button-Events and fills Tables
Caregiver
Caregivers are treating the Patients.
CaregiverDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
CaregiverGroup
the caregiver group, it has permissions for managing patients and their treatments
ChangePasswordController
Logical Layer of the ChangePasswordView
Handles the Process of changing and confirming the Password
ConnectionBuilder
 
Controller
abstract class for the controller and permission managment

please keep in mind, that the Controller is connected to the View programmatically Controller.create(), adding your controller to your View-FXML will end in a total disaster.
ControllerManager
Singleton to keep the Controller-Instances in the Memory
DAO<T>
 
DAOFactory
 
DAOimp<T>
 
DateUtils
Utility Class to manage Dates in the Application
Group
interface for the user groups
GroupFactory
Singleton-Factory for Groups
LoginController
logic of the login process
Main
the main class, the entry point
MainWindowController
homepage of the application
NewTreatmentController
 
NewUserAccountController
Logical Layer of the NewUserAccount View
Contains the Logic to create a new User Account and for ButtonEvents
PasswordHashUtil
An util to check hash a password and validate it. uses BCrypt The reason to use this util is to make sure passwords are safe in the database, in case of a database breach.
Patient
Patients live in a NURSING home and are treated by nurses.
PatientDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
PatientsDeleteJob
This cronjob allows the application to lock all users with an overdue Deletion Date
PatientsLockJob
This cronjob allows the application to lock all users with an overdue Lock Mark Date
PermissionKey
Enum for the Controller-View-Access, is assigned to Groups Group
Person
 
PersonnelGroup
PersonnelGroup, contains every Permission related to the Employees of the Company
Treatment
 
TreatmentController
 
TreatmentDAO
 
User
A user to log in, log out and manage the Data in the Application
UserDAO
DAO Class for the User
Creates PreparedStatements for all DAO Operations for the User
Implements the DAOimp interface
UserSession
Singleton for User in order to keep the logged-in user stored
